definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

sentences.english: When plans for that marriage collapsed, he turned to Barclays.
sentences.chinese: 当这个联姻计划失败时，他转向巴克莱银行。

sentences.english: So you have the big banks, you know, Barclays.
sentences.chinese: 所以有大银行，像巴克莱银行。

sentences.english: You will notice that an ATM card for Barclays Bank is also in this envelope.
sentences.chinese: 你会注意到这个信封里还有一张巴克莱银行的提款卡。

sentences.english: All policies received by Hollard from Barclay Card, will not be subjected to a re-rating process.
sentences.chinese: 所有通过巴克莱银行接受的保单无需进行再次定额。

sentences.english: Barclay Card Head Office will make electronic premium transfer on reporting monthly bordereau .
sentences.chinese: 巴克莱银行总部应按每月的明细单进行保费电子转账。

sentences.english: And there's HSBC and Barclays. They are here,
sentences.chinese: 还有汇丰银行和巴克莱银行。他们都在这里，

sentences.english: He has 20 years of loyal service to Barclays Bank behind him.
sentences.chinese: 他已经忠心耿耿地为巴克莱银行效力了20年。

sentences.english: Around 5% of the bank's customers have objected, Smallman said.
sentences.chinese: 斯摩曼称，巴克莱银行有5%左右的客户拒绝加入。

definition: Hong Kong and Shanghai Banking Corporation (HSBC)
the Stars and Stripes (US flag)/by extension, the United States of America/abbr. for Citibank 花旗銀行|花旗银行
Bloomberg (name)/Michael Bloomberg (1942-), US billionaire businessman, politician and philanthropist
Wall Street, New York/by extension, American big business
